doc.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000

credit.role: Crow T. Robot/Dr. Clayton Deborah Susan Forrester
Crow T. Robot/Dr. Clayton Deborah Susan Forrester
Mikey the Sprite/Mike's Socksy the Sprite
Scooter the Space Child/Ortega/Ned the Nanite
Overdrawn at the Memory Bank Technical Support Operator
Custodian of the Seventh Galaxy from the Planet Ziffalodian
Recording at 'Overdrawn at the Memory Bank Technical Support'

doc.plot: When zany mad scientist Dr. Clayton Forrester and his loopy assistant Frank get bored with their work at the Deep Thirteen research center, they kidnap Joel the janitor and shoot him into orbit on the Satellite of Love. While in space Joel builds wacky robot sidekicks Tom Servo and Crow T. Robot to help him withstand an onslaught of grade 'Z' movies that the mad scientists force him to watch.
